channel.title: Unlisteds on Log of Lapis
channel.description: Recent content in Unlisteds on Log of Lapis

item.title: A response, an apology, and an olive branch.
item.description: This post will remain unlisted, and kept up for the time being. I don’t want to cause more damage than I have already caused. If you do not like this post, feel free to share the link, or save it with CTRL+S, and hold me accountable for it. To preface everything, please keep in mind that I was an emotional idiot with chronic anxiety then, and I still am now. I am two and a half years removed from my twenty years kept with two narcissistic abusers, and my mental state is the equivalent of a war-torn city that I’m still trying to put the pieces together of.
